channel.title: Wolf Scaper 317 EOS
channel.description:
Well, for those who want to see whats done so far, check out our development thread here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,418000.0.html
[center][b]Client Coders[/b]
[ol][li]Wolf Scaper[/li] [li]RSPSCC[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li][/ol] [/center]
[center][b]Server Coders[/b]
[ul][li]Wolf Scaper[/li] [li]Rick[/li] [li]Jason[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b]Idea Development[/b]
[ul][li]Coca Cola[/li] [li]Silent Specs[/li] [li]Wolf Scaper[/li] [li]Desolated PKERS[/li] [li]Legit Can[/li] [li]Thomaso[/li] [li]Souls[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li] [li]OPEN[/li][/ul] [/center]
Okay, now, for those who want to be part of this experience and are thinking, there's probably noobs on this team, your wrong already ^^.
Here's Some Information About Us:
The idea development team starts making a base for whatever they have an idea for, lets say Wolf-Wars...
When we started out with wolf-wars, we had a few ideas, something like runescape's soul wars and something better. So how we made this better was we added obstacles, like ranged towers, mage towers and even "No-Mans-Land"
The ranged towers require you to be using ranged equipment, you can only range from these towers, same goes with mage towers except you use magic.
The No-mans land is a narrow strip that is surrounded by enemy mage and range towers, not to mention that if you die in this strip area, you lose your stuff until the end of the game(or until you log out)
If that isn't enough intensity for you, try having some beast ass monsters pounding you down with ranged and mage! Yeah, and if that still isn't enough for you, you have these obstacles that will randomly kill you...gf...
And, if that still isn't good enough, maybe getting the mass barrage every round will
After 1 minute of the game, if your in wolf wars, you get barraged. This happens every minute, everyone gets barraged.
So, that's what our development team came up with, so, do you wanna join this fucking awesome team?
Heres how you join:
[code] Name: Username For Testing On The Server: How Long You Have Been Coding: Why You Wanna Be On The Team: Referral(if any):[/code]

item.title: Wolf Scaper 317 EOS
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“Souls`, post:2, topic:333084”]Name: Tony
Username For Testing On The Server: So much skil
How Long You Have Been Coding: 6 Years of RSPS coding and 4 years of JAVA coding.
Why You Wanna Be On The Team: Because i want to be part of a devolopment. And also because i like the link you have. It’s actually pretty good.
Referral(if any):N/A[/quote]

Accepted

Read full topic

When we started out with wolf-wars, we had a few ideas, something like runescape’s soul wars and something better. So how we made this better was we added obstacles, like ranged towers, mage towers and even “No-Mans-Land”

If that isn’t enough intensity for you, try having some beast ass monsters pounding you down with ranged and mage! Yeah, and if that still isn’t enough for you, you have these obstacles that will randomly kill you…gf…
